application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of conditions 8 (soft landscaping) pursuant to planning permission 22/02558/FUL for the Application for a minor material amendments to 19/00866/FUL, as previously amended by 19/02421/FUL and  20/01095/FUL, to vary Condition 2 (approved drawings) to allow for the enlargement of the roof element to add an additional flat, the relocation of the building towards the rear of the site by approximately 1m, the addition of two further rear balconies to the roof at the rear of the building, the raising of the eaves height by 20cm and the height of the roof from eaves to ridge reduced by 20cm, changes to elevational materials, the addition of one parking space and changes to external and internal layouts. The parent permission being 19/00866/FUL which granted planning permission for the demolition of the existing dwelling and erection of one 3 storey block comprising 8 x 1 bed. apartments with ancillary parking and bin storage facilities
